title: The Variation of Financial Arbitrage via the Use of an Information Wave Function
abstract: We define an ‘information wave function’, Ψ(q). We underline the role of risk-neutral probabilities in financial non-arbitrage. We argue how a change in the probabilities based on Ψ(q) can induce arbitrage

The Variation of Financial Arbitrage via the Use of an Information Wave Function</dc:title><dc:creator>
Haven, Emmanuel</dc:creator><dc:description>
We define an ‘information wave function’, Ψ(q). We underline the role of risk-neutral probabilities in financial non-arbitrage. We argue how a change in the probabilities based on Ψ(q) can induce arbitrage.</dc:description><dc:date>
